channel.title: File Transfer Protocol (FTP) :: HackForge
channel.description: General Create an active connection ftp $ip Create a passive connection (If you canâ€™t see files it may help) ftp -p $ip List all files ls -lah Download multiple files prompt mget * Download all files using wget wget -r ftp://$user:$password@$ip/ View the directory contents with curl curl -s -v 'ftp://$user:$password@$ip/' View directory contents with curl in passive mode curl -s -v -P - 'ftp://$user:$password@$ip/' Upload a file with curl
